{"result":{"text":"If space the space track space is space smooth space left parenthesis case space straight A right parenthesis comma only space translational space kinetic space energy space changes space to space the space gravitational space potential\nenergy.\nBut comma space if space the space track space is space rough space left parenthesis case space straight B right parenthesis comma space both space translational space and space rotational space kinetic space energy space changes space to space potential\ntable attributes columnalign left end attributes row cell text  energy.  end text end cell row cell text  Therefore, potential energy (=mgh) will be more in case  end text straight B text  than in case A.  end text end cell end table\ntable attributes columnalign left end attributes row cell text  Hence  end text straight h subscript 1 greater than straight h subscript 2 end cell row cell text  Hence  end text left parenthesis straight C right parenthesis end cell end table"},"status":"ok"}
